title: Creating Brand Identity Systems
requirements: Adobe Creative Cloud, Access to Internet, Computer / Laptop / Mobile Device
details: For powerful companies to connect with their target audience, the visual environment must be fully realized. The most successful brands in the world are those that have expert systems in place that capture the essence of the business and filter this messaging through all of its components. These businesses also use design to gain consumer mindshare. Design, time management, presentation, writing, and research abilities are just a few of the many skills that must be mastered when developing brand identification systems.You will examine the full branding process in this course, from the first ideation and brief through the actual launch. The course provides instructions and examples for defining your goal and values, choosing a logo, font, color scheme, and picture style, as well as implementing a creative plan to maintain harmony throughout all of your communications.

title: Responsive Website: HTML5 & CSS3
requirements: Access to Internet, Computer / Laptop / Mobile Device
details: This course covers all the fundamentals of working with HTML and CSS, enabling you to design any layout and guarantee that your site will work on all mobile and desktop platforms. This comprehensive course will transform your skill set and give you the tools you need to begin developing your own websites with confidence. It will cover everything you need to know from the fundamentals of creating your first HTML file to intermediate and advanced techniques for forms, text, navigation, and mastering Bootstrap 4.

title: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
requirements: Access to Internet, Computer / Laptop / Mobile Device
details: The first error that many firms make right off the outset is neglecting to develop a strong strategy prior to developing your digital marketing content. You may immediately enhance the effectiveness of your marketing strategy and overall digital marketing efforts by using the tools, advice, and techniques included in this course. This course will show you how to use a range of frameworks and tools to significantly improve your digital marketing strategy and implementation processes. It includes downloadable templates and uses two business-to-business and business-to-consumer examples.

title: Adobe Premiere Pro Fundamentals
requirements: Adobe Premiere Pro CC (2017 and later), Access to Internet, Computer / Laptop / Mobile Device
details: For creative professionals, Adobe Premiere Pro is a market-leading video editing application with a wide range of features. Learn the fundamentals of Premiere if you want to succeed in the field of video editing or if you currently do it. This is the ultimate foundations course, designed to take you from a complete novice with no experience to an advanced user feeling comfortable and confident to work on any project. Everything from Timeline editing to working with audio, transitions, and titles to color grading, motion creation, chroma keying, and visual effects will be covered. The supplementary downloads offer sample materials that you can use to make your own brief film during the course, such as video clips, images, and other resources.

title: Master In Copywriting
requirements: Access to Internet, Computer / Laptop / Mobile Device
details: This course explains how these wordsmiths use their magic to create compelling copy for millions of readers across the world. You won't write anything that is boring, clunky, confusing, or rambling anymore. You will be able to produce blog posts, web copy, and articles for content marketing using these techniques with flawless style and elegance. For individuals who are familiar with fundamental grammar and want to advance their writing, the course is perfect.

title: Data Science Fundamentals
requirements: Access to Internet, Computer / Laptop / Mobile Device
details: In the appropriate hands, data sets can aid in future prediction and shaping. Data science, one of the industries with the quickest growth, has numerous and significant applications in numerous industries. You will learn key terms in this course and develop a knowledge of the core data science techniques.Enroll right away to advance your career and take advantage of the many chances that understanding data science offers.
